name: Topics in Political Thought
description: Content of course will vary from year to year. Consult the Political Science Handbook. [48L] Restrictions: 1) 400-series POL courses are limited to POL Specialists and Joint Specialits; 2) No POL Specialist may take more than 2.0 POL credits at the 400-level (1.0 for Joint Specialists).
prerequisites: POL320Y5 or consent of the instructor
